content: अपाकरणं, अपाकृतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Driving away, removal. {@--2@} Rejection, refutation; तदपाकरणायाह <ls>Praśna Up.</ls> {@--3@} Payment, liquidation; ऋणत्रयापकरणान्नास्त्यपवर्गः <ls>Nyāya S.</ls>
अपाकृतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Rejection, removal &c. {@--2@} Emotion resulting from anger, fear &c.; <ls>Ki. 1. 27.</ls>
